structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ISSUANCE OF BONDS AND CONTROL OF FUNDS

law.history: Repealed 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 4, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 508, sec. 28, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 41, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 2. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(2); and ch. 257, sec. 2. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 15. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938q-3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: County Debt Commission -- Appeal from rulings of state local debt officer.
